CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc New Chiefs?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc New Chiefs is arc {Bensonborough Storm}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc South Stars?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc South Stars is arc {Poolechester Dynasty}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Bensonborough Storm} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Poolechester Dynasty} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from South Stars to Bensonborough Storm in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from South Stars to Poolechester Dynasty in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Poolechester Dynasty and Bensonborough Storm in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Poolechester Dynasty and Bensonborough Storm is {672}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between South Stars and Bensonborough Storm in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between South Stars and Bensonborough Storm is {199}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Bensonborough Storm?
SC.A: The total flow output from Bensonborough Storm is {871}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by New Chiefs?
SC.A: The total flow input by New Chiefs is {520}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 499? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {672} from {Bensonborough Storm} to {Poolechester Dynasty}, a flow of {631} from {Poolechester Dynasty} to {Bensonborough Storm}, a flow of {520} from {South Stars} to {New Chiefs}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 297? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {264} from {South Stars} to {Bensonborough Storm}, a flow of {199} from {Bensonborough Storm} to {South Stars}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 374 and 499? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {479} from {New Chiefs} to {South Stars}, a flow of {418} from {South Stars} to {Poolechester Dynasty}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Bensonborough Storm to South Stars or from South Stars to Bensonborough Storm?
NC.A: The flow from {South Stars} to {Bensonborough Storm} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Bensonborough Storm to South Stars, from South Stars to New Chiefs, or from New Chiefs to South Stars?
NC.A: The flow from {South Stars} to {New Chiefs} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {South Stars}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Bensonborough Storm} and {Poolechester Dynasty}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Poolechester Dynasty, Arc Bensonborough Storm, Arc South Stars, Arc New Chiefs}.
